categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic holidays

nodes.text: Endor Day was a holiday that was celebrated by the peoples of the Alliance of Free Planets and later the New Republic. It was held on the anniversary of the Battle of Endor and celebrated the victory of the Rebel Alliance's Fleet over the Imperial Navy, as well as the death of Emperor Palpatine and Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Vader. It also honored those that died during the battle. Fireworks were used to recreate the celebration held on Endor and planets galaxy-wide after the destruction of the second Death Star.

Star Wars Battlefront: Renegade Squadron includes special awards for topping score tables on real-life holidays as an easter egg, casting Wookiee Life Day as Christmas and Endor Day as the Fourth of July.
